postContent:
Due to the volume and diversity of the body of work produced at Amalgam, the home page is a full screen slide show containing a variety of projects covering all disciplines. This allows partners to highlight some of their favourite projects.

Over the years Amalgam has worked with many photographers and accumulated a lot of photography in different formats and quality. After going through their archive photographs arent high
